replies.body: Would it be possible to bring URF back for the duration of the Worlds events? It's been too long...
I would love to see Hexakill come back too.
how about old ascension? No? Only me? okay {{sticker:sg-soraka}}
u mean dominion
I bare this icon, not as a sigil of attainment, but as a burden. A grim reminder of what was taken from me.
I believe they all do mean dominion
how about just having Dominion come back in?{{sticker:cass-cry}}
{{sticker:sg-soraka}}
Hexakill Summoner's Rift.
That would distract from Worlds, they can't do that unfortunately.
Distract from worlds? People who watch worlds, watch worlds. Those who play for fun, play for fun. There's no such thing as a distraction when you are giving your player base a game mode they enjoy.
What about those people who both play for fun and watch worlds, I guess those don't exist anymore.

You can play competitively and have fun, but I believe he means "fun" as in, they like to casually play the game every now and then, but couldn't care less about what doesn't involve them or what's right in front of their face, like they don't go out of their way to seek more LoL content.
Sorry but the games are at 4 am.  I normally watch worlds but this year im skipping.
Thats why they have the rebroadcast in the afternoon.
Exactly, and you can just watch them all individually too (which is what I do when not watching live because I only want to watch certain teams)

This is exactly what I was thinking. You want me to get interested in Worlds? Don't play it at 4am on a weekday. However, League is owned by a Chinese company and that makes sense for them. We can't win them all. {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

Saying that you wont watch worlds cause of the timezone and stating that Leagues is a "Chinese" owned company therefore they're bias is totally ignorant. For one Worlds is Held in South Korea so i see no Chinese bias there and secondly even WHEN worlds was held in NA the majority of viewership was from Chinese natives at 2AM their time. So really its more of the fact that NA obviously isn't as devoted.

Without Chinese viewers
30 Oct at 12:30 am
1 585 072 viewers
English stream peak
30 Oct at 12:30 am
875 218 viewers
Russian stream peak
16 Oct at 10:50 pm
16 015 viewers
Chinese stream peak
30 Oct at 5:20 am
26 820 666 viewers
Twitch.tv Viewers peak stats
30 Oct at 12:35 am
971 092 viewers
[](https://esc.watch/tournaments/lol/worlds-2016)
I’m at school when they’re happening so I just have to watch replays

There is a thread somewhere where Riot talked about why URF will likely never return in its base form. What I remember is that essentially the fallout of bringing it back makes it net too negative on player count.
The community voted that ARUF was better to avoid the constant "toxic" picks. This poll was taken before the 10 ban system though. If they did LCS style bans I'm sure URF would be great
Not only 10 bans, probably should have 12 bans and it should be draft pick. I would propose nemesis pick but that may have too much of a negative impact
See, that's where I have an issue. There are over 100 champions in the game and in ARURF you never saw more then half of them.
But if you don't have ARURF then you get the same 10 champions every game, and 10 isn't even half.

They had a big Text that the riot had more active player during urf than usual but after urf more ppl than usual quit LOL. And more ppl quit league cuz of urf than more player coming new or reinstall lol cuz of urf. so every time they bring urf they do minus in player and the rest is in my opinion just covering that fact
I would also like to see URF come back, but it really needs to be a draft with at least 10 bans or something.
I wish, but riot is afraid because whenever urf is here they lose so much of the player base to it. I don't see the problem though, if players love urf, let them play urf
the problem is players literally stop playing because of it. theres a vast majority of players who like league in its balanced form.
They aren't forced to play urf though. If they like League in its normal form, they can play that. People aren't forced to play RGMs
that'd be awesome!!!!
Time to guess randomly and hope something comes of it this year {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
watch this guy in particular get all the ultimate skins
Nah, it's gonna be you now. You jinxed it for him. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
I just watch a couple of pros do their picks and then hope. Ive gotten both icons every year with that tactic.

> ...you’ll be rewarded with a set of five Ultimate skins...

*a set of four ultimate skins and Gun Goddess Miss Fortune :^)
i like gun goddess MF it looks sick u a ho
More arguments need to end with "u a ho"
they're new icons...
I think Gen G will repeat.
Nah nah, C9s got it this year.
yup for sure, when you are considering that they almost lost to a Japan team (DFM). Tots gonna win Worlds xD
but the EU team ACTUALLY lost to a minor region. I wouldn't be talking if i were you
iEthan3 Holy clap-a-saurus batman
Just kidding. KT ROLLERCOASTER FOR THE WIN!
What if you already own all the ultimate skins though?
You get the permanent shards instead.
Then you already gave Riot money so they have nothing to offer you XD
how do people get golden chroma championship ashe?
You had to get it last worlds from the championship tokens
